_header: Hail be thou Lady so bright / Gabriel that said so right
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: A hymn to the Virgin Mary — six 6-line stanzas (aabaab)

CULIi643.First Lines:
hEyle be þu ladye so bryȝtGabriel þat seyde so
                    ryȝt…
CULIi643.Last Lines:
…Marye þu vs wysely wysseBe daye and be nyȝt
                    Amen
CULIi643.Attributed Title: Oracio de sancta maria sequens (f. 89v, bottom)
